location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Resident, Bushire, to Richard Morgan, Secretary to the Marine Board, Bombay

mods.abstract: In this letter, William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, transmits an abstract of advances (not included) and a bill for supplies (not included) sent on board the Malabarcountry ship, to be used by the surviving crew members of the Honourable Company cruiser Ariel.
